text: Welcome to ECOM Love Idioms and
Expressions 31. In these videos, we'll
teach you phrases often heard in
romantic comedies and phrases you can
use in your own love lives. We'll give
you some examples and tell you the
correct situations in which you can use
these phrases. So, listen carefully,
have fun, and let's get started.

Today's love expression is love at first
sight. Love at first
sight. Now this is a very commonly used

many people don't believe. How about

and it was love at first sight.
Did she feel the same
